qas.question: Which of Virgil's works was said by some to have predicted Jesus' birth?
Which religion did some consider Virgil to have heralded in?
During which time period did Virgil's reputation inspire legends associating him with magic and prophecy?
What did Virgil write about the most?
Who was the first to predict Jesus's birth?
When did Virgil predict Jesus would be born?

context: In the <a2_0>Middle Ages<a2_0/>, Virgil's reputation was such that it inspired legends associating him with <b3_0>magic<b3_0/> and prophecy. From at least <b6_0>the 3rd century<b6_0/>, Christian thinkers interpreted <a0_0>Eclogues 4<a0_0/>, which describes the birth of a boy ushering in a golden age, as a prediction of Jesus' birth. As such, Virgil came to be seen on a similar level as <b4_0>the Hebrew prophets<b4_0/> of the Bible as one who had heralded <a1_0><b5_0>Christianity<b5_0/><a1_0/>.
